#### Topic outline

- Importance of Cost â€“ Benefit Analysis in the context of Impact Assessment
- Examples of Costs and Benefits
- Net Present Value (NPV): present value of benefits versus investment costs
- Internal Rate of Return (IRR): the rate of return at which the investment value is
equal to the value of the benefit flow
- Benefit-Cost Ratio: ratio of the present value of the benefits to the present value
of the total investment costs (including implementation costs)
- Sensitivity Analysis: the process of generating alternate cases to check the
effect of changes in essential variables
- Scenario Analysis: the formulation of various scenarios (best, base, worst) to
review CBA metrics
